title: Ranked team JOIN NOW
body:
Hello everyone, I am currently leader of a ranked team named  Ao1thousand    which stands for army of 1 thousand, and we are looking for some new summoners to join we have currently full team but we will be kicking 3 players for inactiveness so there will be positions opening up it doesn't matter about which rank or division you are in, all that matters is that you have a good personality and be a good team player or else find another team.. 
You can message me ingame on: Eliminator96

Fill out this box please, Thank you.

 ingame name:
rank/division:
best lanes:
best champs:
are you active & willing to play also participate in team activities?
age (not required but helps):

Thank you, see you in game :D

I play most nights, just have to work around kids. Looking for a friendly team to learn from and play with.
There will be a 5v5 game tomorrow be on at around 7 - 10 if you would want to join thats what time we would start, just practice and test peoples skills ! Thanks this is Sydney time tho :D

Okay well, since there were more than i expected.. Please message me on LoL and we will have our conversation from there, also we will have trail games before we can start in ranked team games! Okay thank you very much :D {{champion:122}}
